Research Method : The investigator conduct 8-week proof-of-concept , assessor single-blinded randomized control trial ( RCT ) 75 old adult ( i.e. , 25 experimental group ) . A subset participant perform MRI scan baseline 8-weeks . To reduce bias , assessor blind group allocation participant . Participants randomly assign one three group ( i.e. , FBT , Ex-FBT , SCT ) . Participants FBT group require attend 3 formal training session per week , 8 week , Djavad Mowafaghian Centre Brain Health . Each session 60 minute . Additionally , participant ask complete 3 additional one-hour training session home per week . Thus , participant complete total 48 hour cognitive train 8 week . Participants randomize Ex-FBT require attend 3 formal training session per week , 8 week , Djavad Mowafaghian Centre Brain Health . Each session 1 hour . The participant start train 15-minute walk outside . The 15-minute walk follow 45-minute FBT session ( FBT program ) . Additionally , participant ask complete 3 additional 1-hour training session home ( i.e. , 15-minute walk follow 45-minutes FBT training ) . Thus , participant complete total 48 hour cognitive + walk train 8 week . Participants randomly assign BAT group require attend 3 formal training session per week , 8 week , Djavad Mowafaghian Centre Brain Health Centre Hip Health Mobility .
